alert.note: Alert for Eastern Roosevelt; Richland; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Roosevelt, Sheridan and north central Richland Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Port Of Raymond to 7 miles northwest of Culbertson. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Culbertson, Medicine Lake, Bainville, Froid, Westby, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Fort Kipp, Dagmar, Homestead, Dooley, Comertown, Mccabe, Antelope and Coalridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
